content: large crochet summer beach bag hope you enjoy this pattern if you have any questions please do not hesitate to email me at deb0321@yahoo com materials laespiga omega nylon cord size 18 5 tubes crochet hook size e abbreviation chain chain single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet yo yarn over special stitches starting cluster chain 3 -yo insert hook in same stitch as joining yo and draw up a loop yo and draw through 2 loops -yo and insert hook in same stitch and draw up a loop yo and draw through 2 loops 3 loops on hook -yo and draw yarn through all remaining loops on hook full cluster ch3 -yo insert hook in top of starting cluster -yo and draw up a loop yo and draw through 2 loops -yo and insert hook in same stitch and draw up a loop yo and draw through 2 loops 3 loops on hook -yo and insert hook in 3rd stitch from previous vertical cluster draw up a loop yo and draw through 2 loops -yo and insert hook in same stitch as before draw up a loop yo and draw through 2 loops -yo and insert hook in same stitch as before draw up a loop yo and draw through 2 loops 6 loops on hook -yo and draw through all remaining loops on hook ending cluster ch3 -yo insert hook in top of starting cluster -yo and draw up a loop yo and draw through 2 loops copyright©2008 debbie edgerly all rights reserved page 1 of 3 -yo and insert hook in same stitch and draw up a loop yo and draw through 2 loops 3 loops on hook -insert hook in top of starting cluster yo and draw through all remaining loops on hook instructions chain 51 row 1 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and in each chain across turn 50 single_crochet row 2 row 18 ch1 single_crochet across turn row 19 ch1 single_crochet across do not turn round 1 ch1 working around all 4 sides of piece - work 3sc in each corner stitch and 1sc in all other stitches 150 single_crochet 150 = 2*50 length + 4*3 corners + 2*19 width note bottom of bag should be multiple of 3 for cluster stitches round 2 ch1 single_crochet in back loops only of each single_crochet below join with slip_stitch to ch1 150 stitches round 3-5 work starting cluster in same stitch as joining **skip 2 stitches and work full cluster in 3rd stitch ** repeat from ** to ** around work ending cluster to connect and complete round round 6-9 ch3 1 double_crochet in each cluster center and 2 double_crochet in each horizontal bar around join with slip_stitch to 3rd chain in ch3 round 10-12 repeat rounds 3-5 round 13-18 ch2 1 half_double_crochet in each cluster center and 2 half_double_crochet in each horizontal bar join with slip_stitch to 2nd chain in ch2 round 19-21 repeat rounds 3-5 copyright©2008 debbie edgerly all rights reserved page 2 of
